meanings.definition: Ran at full speed for a short distance.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah sprinted across the savannah to catch its prey.
meanings.sent2: She sprinted to the finish line and won the race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel sprinted up the tree to escape the chasing dog.
meanings.sent4: Time sprinted by as they enjoyed their carefree summer days.
meanings.sent5: The sprinted movement of the dancer captivated the audience.

meanings.sent1: She hurriedly sprinted to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent2: He moved sprinted through the crowded street to get to the store on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat sprinted stealthily across the room to catch the mouse by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The news spread like wildfire, sprinted from person to person in the village.
meanings.sent5: The wind sprinted through the trees, rustling the leaves in its path.
